answers.answer: why aren't you going to the doctor?

You need to be going to your OBGYN... You could go into early labor if you do have something wrong! Have you had an anatomy scan to check thta the baby is growing properly? Have you have your gestational diabetes check done? Please get in to see your doc...

question: I'm 27 weeks pregnant and haven't went to the doctor since I was 15 weeks my stomach isn't hard yet could there be something wrong the baby moves fine but not hard yet with my first born it was hard at 6 months what could be the problem?
title: 27 weeks pregnant
